message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase the product for $11,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,250?
I'm willing to consider $10,250, but I'd like to make a slight adjustment to $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
